QuestData.Title: Hidden Dealings
QuestData.Description:
<Among her possessions, the witch carried a crudely drawn map of Arom's Stand.
A symbol marks what looks like the entrance to a cellar beneath one of the buildings.
If this location is important to the coven, it might be worth scouting out.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Explore the location marked on the Crude Map.
QuestData.RewardText:
You found their leader? Excellent work, $c!
The people of Arom's Stand will be safe, now that you've so thoroughly dismantled the coven's machinations here.
